input_args.passage: "L'Ethique sexuelle de l'Islam by Georges-Henri Bousquet | Bousquet was a 20th-century French jurist, economist and Islamologist. He ... He is also known for his translation work of the great Muslim authors, Al ... $10.30, \u200e30, day returns"
